import { useState } from "react"; const Add = () => { let[title,setTitle] = useState(''); let[data,setData] = useState(''); let[pic,setPic] = useState(''); let[score,setScore] = useState('-'); const SubmitHandle = (e) => { const blog ={ title, pic, score, data }; console.log(blog); } return (
setTitle(e.target.value)}/>
setPic(e.target.value)}/>

{title}

{data}

{pic}

{score}

); } export default Add;
